content: ब्राह्मण्य {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Befitting a Brāhmaṇa. --ण्यः An epithet of the planet Saturn. --ण्यं {@--1@} The station or rank of a Brāhmaṇa, priestly or sacerdotal character; सत्यं शपे ब्राह्मण्येन <ls>Mk. 5</ls>; <ls>Pt. 1. 66</ls>; <ls>Ms. 3. 17</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">7. 42.</ls> {@--2@} A collection of Brāhmaṇas.
